system.notes:
Some Spacemarines, and humans, choose not to wear a helmet. If they do, Helmet Autosenses do not function, and their armour is not airtight. Their Vox works but only Audio.
They gain +5 to Fellowship Tests and Tests to prevent Cohesion Damage. At GM discretion they may gain +1 Renown whenever it is awarded.
